resources.string:
Hi, my name is Beatriz 

I'm a aerospace engineer currently learning android development. 

I like to learn new idioms like japanese and english, and also new programming languages such as Kotlin and Java. 

I like to spend my free time playing online games with my friends and family or reading webtoons. I also love watching new movies and tv series with my boyfriend. 

In these last two years, I've been making extra effort to be organized and to follow a routine.
